title: Permutation eSports Looking for Staff
body:
Permutation eSports is about to launch three teams of plat + players. 
However, we are still in need of coaches and analysts to make the player experience more efficient and productive.
Don't worry if your solo queue rank isn't as high as others tell you it needs to be - if you have a experience or even if you don't, just send me a friend request and we can talk it out.
I have extensive experience coaching and analyzing at a decent level and would be more than happy to train intelligent, committed individuals who just don't have the mechanics.
Add BurstFire303 in game if you are interested.
